Lin-Zhi Multiple Analyte Set A, B and C Urine Drugs of Abuse Calibrators
Lin-Zhi Multiple Analyte Set A, B and C Urine Drugs of Abuse Controls
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Lin-Zhi Multiple Analyte Set A, B, and C Urine Drugs of Abuse Calibrators and Controls for toxicology assay calibration and validation.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use as calibrators and controls for prescription use with homogeneous enzyme immunoassays on automated clinical chemistry analyzers for the listed drugs of abuse in human urine.
